SelectAll: SELECT sc.SubcategoryKey,sc.CategoryKey,c.CategoryName,sc.AccountKey,a.AccountName,sc.SubcategoryName,sc.SubcategoryPrefix,sc.IsActive,sc.IsGoal,sc.LastUpdatedDate FROM dimSubcategory sc INNER JOIN dimCategory c ON sc.CategoryKey = c.CategoryKey INNER JOIN dimAccount a ON sc.AccountKey = a.AccountKey
UpdateRow: UPDATE dimSubcategory sc SET sc.CategoryKey = ?, sc.AccountKey = ?, sc.SubcategoryName = ?, sc.SubcategoryPrefix = ?, sc.IsActive = ?, sc.IsGoal = ?, sc.LastUpdatedDate = NOW() WHERE sc.SubcategoryKey = ?
InsertRow: INSERT INTO dimSubcategory (SubcategoryKey, CategoryKey, AccountKey, SubcategoryName, SubcategoryPrefix, IsActive, IsGoal, LastUpdatedDate) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, NOW())
GetRowWithKey: SELECT sc.SubcategoryKey, sc.CategoryKey, c.CategoryName, sc.AccountKey, a.AccountName, sc.SubcategoryName, sc.SubcategoryPrefix, sc.IsActive, sc.IsGoal, sc.LastUpdatedDate FROM dimSubcategory sc INNER JOIN dimCategory c ON sc.CategoryKey = c.CategoryKey INNER JOIN dimAccount a ON sc.AccountKey = a.AccountKey WHERE sc.SubcategoryKey = ?
